item.title: Gene Hackman, Hollywood’s Consummate Everyman, Dies at 95
item.description: The winner of two Oscars, he was hailed for his nuanced performances in films like “The French Connection,” “Unforgiven” and “The Royal Tenenbaums.”

item.title: Gene Hackman: 13 Memorable Movies to Stream
item.description: He played a complicated hero in “The French Connection” and an arch-villain in “Superman.” Here are some of Hackman’s career highlights.
